import React from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" const STYLES = [ 'input--main', 'input--search', 'input--wide', 'input--image', 'input--image-user' ] const A_Input = ({ type, value, onChange, inputStyle, placeholder, inputSize, textChild }) => { const checkInputStyle = STYLES.includes(inputStyle) ? inputStyle : STYLES[0] return(
{}
) } export default Input
